title: Who Killed Eliza Fletcher? | True Crime Sunday
description:
Eliza Fletcher’s body found; Abston charged with murder

Sheriff’s Office arrested Cartersville, GA Deputy Police Chief for Soliciting a Prostitute

Man convicted in robbery, throat-slashing murder of Hitch hiker in Prince George
